attributes.action: Allow Trans individuals to self ID as the gender they identify as
attributes.additional_details: This allows trans and nonbinary people to have more autonomy over their identity and cuts down on the time and expense needed to change their gender identity. Those at the age of 16 are old and mature enough to be able to recognise their gender and have it recognised by law and therefore should be included in this situation.
attributes.background: Allow transgender and Nonbinary people over the age of 16 to self identify their gender on birth certificates, passports and all forms of ID without a medical diagnoses

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/579904
